original_text: I am weary with my groaning; all the night make I my bed to swim; I water my couch with my tears.
korean_text: 내가 탄식함으로 피곤하여 밤마다 눈물로 내 침상을 띄우며 내 요를 적시나이다

sentences.original_text: I am weary with my groaning
make I my bed to swim
I water my couch with my tears
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 나의 눈물로 내 소파를 적신다
